about_the_game:
Sliding Puzzle Deluxe brings you the timeless charm of the classic sliding puzzle game in a delightful and engaging package. Prepare to challenge your puzzle-solving skills as you slide the tiles to reveal the complete image and conquer a variety of captivating levels.

Immerse yourself in the addictive gameplay as you navigate the sliding tiles, rearranging them to form the original picture. With different grid sizes and difficulty levels, the game offers a suitable challenge for players of all ages and experience levels. Test your strategic thinking, spatial awareness, and problem-solving abilities as you strive to solve each puzzle with the fewest moves possible.

Experience a visually stunning collection of images spanning various themes and subjects. From breathtaking landscapes and famous landmarks to adorable animals and intricate artworks, each puzzle presents a new and captivating visual journey. Enjoy the satisfaction of successfully reconstructing the image and witnessing the seamless merging of the sliding tiles.

Sliding Puzzle Deluxe offers intuitive controls, smooth animations, and a user-friendly interface, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable gaming experience. Challenge yourself to unlock achievements, earn high scores, and compete with friends and family to see who can solve the puzzles the fastest.

Escape into a world of sliding puzzle fun with Sliding Puzzle Deluxe, the ultimate tribute to the classic game. Exercise your mind, indulge in the nostalgia, and relish the satisfaction of solving each challenging puzzle. Get ready to slide your way to victory and become the master of the sliding tiles.


Gameplay:

Sliding Puzzle Deluxe The Classic is a game where you have to slide pieces around to get them in the right spot. If you have all pieces in the right spot, you complete the level!

Sliding Puzzle Deluxe The Classic includes lots of images in five gameplay modes, easy, normal, hard, master, and pro.

Sliding games improve problem-solving skills and improve concentration. Move the tiles to reassemble the picture, by clicking the block you want to move. The complexity increases as you play along.

Playing a sliding Puzzle is a good workout for the brain and keeps the brain active and refreshed. Play daily for some time and you can keep the brain happy.

Sliding Puzzle help to improve memory, agility, hand-eye coordination, and patience.
